title: Which are your personal written lines? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not so good at writing but I wrote these eight lines on 24th of may 2019. Maybe the pain still remains, to crawl back to you once again. Or maybe the worst has ended, the pain has at last descended. Or it’s just cloaked behind your smile, to say ‘hello again’ in awhile. Or maybe you are just utterly numb, helpless, hopeless to the outcome. thank you!

upvoters.user_id: Anuj Kumar Singh ( अनुज कुमार सिंह)

response.answer_text: She was the finest and the softest thread, But he was a pair of scissors. All he knew was to cut her to pieces.

upvoters.user_id: Anuj Kumar Singh ( अनुज कुमार सिंह)
